bucket.description: The name of the bucket to store the file in

block_public_acls.description: Whether Amazon S3 should block public ACLs for this bucket

block_public_policy.description: Whether Amazon S3 should block public bucket policies for this bucket

ignore_public_acls.description: Whether Amazon S3 should ignore public ACLs for this bucket

restrict_public_buckets.description: Whether Amazon S3 should restrict public buckets for this bucket
